statements: SELECT * FROM human_rights_organizations;
SELECT organization_name, country FROM human_rights_organizations WHERE year_established > 2000;
SELECT organization_name, primary_focus FROM human_rights_organizations WHERE country = 'United States';
SELECT * FROM human_rights_organizations WHERE primary_focus LIKE '%children%';
SELECT organization_name, activities FROM human_rights_organizations WHERE year_established < 1990 AND country IN ('Brazil', 'Argentina');
SELECT * FROM human_rights_organizations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT organization_name, primary_focus FROM human_rights_organizations WHERE year_established < 2000 ORDER BY organization_name ASC;
SELECT organization_name, activities FROM human_rights_organizations WHERE primary_focus = 'Civil Liberties' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM human_rights_organizations WHERE country = 'India' AND year_established > 2010;
SELECT id, organization_name, country, year_established FROM human_rights_organizations WHERE primary_focus LIKE '%Rights%' ORDER BY year_established DESC;
SELECT id, name, country FROM human_rights_organizations;
SELECT name, id, country FROM human_rights_organizations ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM activities WHERE organization_id = 1;
SELECT activity_type, location FROM activities WHERE organization_id = 2 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT id, name, country FROM human_rights_organizations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM human_rights_organizations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM activities WHERE activity_type = 'Advocacy' ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT name, country FROM human_rights_organizations ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT hro.name, a.location FROM human_rights_organizations hro JOIN activities a ON hro.id = a.organization_id WHERE a.location LIKE '%New York%';

SELECT hro.name AS organization_name, COUNT(a.id) AS activity_count FROM human_rights_organizations hro LEFT JOIN activities a ON hro.id = a.organization_id GROUP BY hro.id HAVING activity_count > 5 ORDER BY activity_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM organizations;
SELECT organization_name, country FROM organizations;
SELECT * FROM members WHERE role='Executive';
SELECT organization_name, founding_date FROM organizations WHERE country='USA';
SELECT organization_name, member_name, role FROM organizations JOIN members ON organizations.organization_id = members.organization_id;
SELECT * FROM organizations
SELECT organization_name, country FROM organizations WHERE country = 'USA'
SELECT organization_name, founding_date FROM organizations WHERE founding_date >= '2000-01-01'
SELECT organization_name, country, activity_name, location FROM organizations JOIN activities ON organizations.organization_id = activities.organization_id
SELECT member_name, organization_name, role FROM members JOIN organizations ON members.organization_id = organizations.organization_id WHERE organization_name = 'Tech Inc'
SELECT * FROM organizations;
SELECT name, country, established_date FROM organizations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT id, name, country FROM organizations ORDER BY established_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM activities WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT name, position FROM employees WHERE organization_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM organizations;
SELECT name, country FROM organizations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT id, activity_date, activity_description FROM activities ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE country = 'Canada' AND city = 'Toronto';
SELECT employees.name, employees.position, organizations.name AS org_name FROM employees INNER JOIN organizations ON employees.organization_id = organizations.id WHERE employees.position = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM organizations;
SELECT name, country FROM organizations WHERE country='USA';
SELECT id, name, description FROM activities WHERE organization_id=1;
SELECT * FROM countries ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, date, location FROM events WHERE organization_id=2;
SELECT * FROM organizations WHERE country='USA';
SELECT name, country FROM organizations WHERE id=3;
SELECT * FROM organizations WHERE name LIKE '%Tech%';
SELECT org.name, ev.name as event_name FROM organizations org JOIN events ev ON org.id = ev.organization_id;
SELECT org.name, cnt.email FROM organizations org JOIN contacts cnt ON org.id = cnt.organization_id WHERE cnt.email IS NOT NULL;
